text: @BryanCranston Breaking News:  @PressSec and @realDonaldTrump announcement leaked.  The #WhiteHouse to reveal that @POTUS “feels” and “heard” and “believes” that if you consumed Elmers Glue or Paste as a child you have an immunity to #COVID19 #GlueIsForYou #PasteNotWaste
